response.overview: The film is divided into six sections filmed in Montr√©al hospitals.  The first section of the film features the first close-up footage of a vaginal delivery  The second section, on kidney dialysis  The third portrays a thalidomide victim with malformed arms  The fourth presents an experimental apparatus for mapping lung function  The fifth follows a boy through open-heart surgery
response.tagline: a close-up at modern medicine procedures
response.title: miracles in modern medicine
